name: Hoverboard Segway Driving
description:
Have you ever dreamed of driving segway hoverboard ?
Segway Hoverboard Driving is amazing game which gives you the perfect example of segway driving

Using hoverboard you can do many stunts and there are many levels of tracks in which you can try endless possibilities of segway stunts. According to your stunts skill, you can earn money and using those money you can unlock many different segway with high speed and stability.

Feature:
- Amazingly 3D tracks
- Lots of different segways to choose from
- Easy handling and light weight User Interface


This application is not developed by the segway makers. Hoverboard Segway Driving is just the simulator of the segway
